article_title: America isn't sure if it wants Roger Goodell to lose his job
article_text:
Fans have weighed in. Pundits have weighed in. Players have weighed in. Politicians have weighed in. Owners have weighed in. Everyone has an opinion of whether NFL commissioner Roger Goodell should keep his job in the wake of a string of domestic violence cases.

And yet, there’s no consensus. Here’s what we’ve been told:

article_metadata.news_keywords: Brandon Marshall,domestic violence,Jerry Richardson,Joe Ellis,John Mara,media,Players,Ray Rice,Roger Goodell

og.description: Myriad polls, pundits and players have spoken up about Roger Goodell's handling of recent domestic violence cases, but no consensus has been reached on whether he should keep his job.

Everyone has an opinion of whether NFL commissioner Roger Goodell should keep his job in the wake of a string of domestic violence cases.
Pundits have weighed in.

Here’s what we’ve been told:
